about.title: About CareAI
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing senior care through technology
about.intro: We're transforming how families care for their loved ones through intelligent technology and compassionate design.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: Our mission is to provide compassionate, intelligent care solutions that enhance the quality of life for seniors and peace of mind for their families.

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.body: We work with leading healthcare organizations to deliver exceptional patient care and improve outcomes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: To create a world where every senior receives personalized, dignified care that respects their independence while ensuring their safety and well-being.

contact.title: Contact Us

testimonial.quote: CareAI has transformed how we care for our elderly parents. The peace of mind it provides is invaluable.

partners.title: Trusted by partners
